options.label: Power on, LED off; power off, LED on
Power on, LED on;power off, LED off

metadata.inclusion:
*Smart Start Inclusion
The feature assumes the gateway has implemented Smart Start. Users could use the APP of the gateway or the gateway camera to scan the QR code on device or on device package even before powering on the device, when the device is powered on, it shall be automatically added to the gateway. 
*Manual Inclusion
When the gateway is in adding mode (please refer to the instruction of the Z-Wave gateway for the operations on gateway itself):
quick click x3, (within 1.5s/ interval<0.5s), on either top or bottom paddle
metadata.exclusion:
When the gateway is in removing mode (please refer to the instruction of the Z-Wave gateway for the operations on gateway itself):
quick click x3, (within 1.5s/ interval<0.5s), on either top or bottom paddle
metadata.reset: 3x quick click +1 x press> 10 seconds, on either top or bottom paddle
